tool_description: This API enables the decoding of Danish license plates, providing access to information about the corresponding vehicles. Using a license plate number, the API can retrieve various details such as the full name of the vehicle, the chassis number (VIN), fuel type, the CO2 emission, maximum speed, and other relevant data.
name: Danish License Plates Decoder
title: Danish License Plates Decoder

api_list.name: plate_number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://danish-license-plates-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/hl/DC61339"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "danish-license-plates-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://danish-license-plates-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/{language}/{plate_number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "danish-license-plates-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
